text: I get a warning that BaseException.message is deprecated in Python 2.6 when I use the following user-defined exception:

code:
class MyException(Exception):

def __init__(self, message):
    self.message = message

def __str__(self):
    return repr(self.message)

DeprecationWarning: BaseException.message has been deprecated as of Python 2.6
self.message = message

text: What do I have to change to get rid of the deprecation warning?
